item.title: Mars 7/27/18
item.description: Mars during the 2018 opposition with polar ice caps visible. Taken with Canon T5i using Celestron 11" with eyepiece projection. Stacked image from video.
item.media:description: Mars during the 2018 opposition with polar ice caps visible. Taken with Canon T5i using Celestron 11" with eyepiece projection. Stacked image from video.

item.title: Gibbous Mars on 10/3/18
item.description: Mars captured in a gibbous phase. This was on 10/3/18, a few months after opposition when Mars was moving away from Earth. Taken with Canon T5i on Celestron 11" with eyepiece projection. Stacked image from video.
item.media:description: Mars captured in a gibbous phase. This was on 10/3/18, a few months after opposition when Mars was moving away from Earth. Taken with Canon T5i on Celestron 11" with eyepiece projection. Stacked image from video.

item.title: Mars - 9/25/20.
item.description: Mars with polar ice caps clearly visible during the 2020 opposition. Taken with Canon T5i on Celestron 11" with eyepiece projection.
item.media:description: Mars with polar ice caps clearly visible during the 2020 opposition. Taken with Canon T5i on Celestron 11" with eyepiece projection.

item.title: Mars - 10/9/20.
item.description: Mars with polar ice caps clearly visible. Taken on 10/9/20 during the 2020 opposition. The dark projection from the center is Syrtis Major. Taken with Canon T5i on Celestron 11" with eyepiece projection.
item.media:description: Mars with polar ice caps clearly visible. Taken on 10/9/20 during the 2020 opposition. The dark projection from the center is Syrtis Major. Taken with Canon T5i on Celestron 11" with eyepiece projection.
